title: No... Amumu... That's not how Friendship Works
body:
http://farahboom.deviantart.com/art/ARAM-Adventures-Kindred-Spirits-560522737

**How the hell did you get that axe**

replies.body:
{{champion:122}} : you were right... This was a good idea
{{champion:119}} : Draven is never wrong
{{champion:122}}: *rolls eyes*
I would imagine that both amumu's would hate each other, and immediately go their separate ways.
Would 1 have the curse or both?
I'm pretty sure all of amumu has the curse, splitting himself into two won't absolve one of the curse.

{{champion:119}} "What do you want to borrow my axe for?"

{{champion:32}} "To get a friend."

{{champion:122}} "Yeah he's getting it now! *thumbs up* "
It's not like he has any better options... damn why does Ammumu have to be so sad?

But wouldn't that give him....._a boo-boo_?
I'm not sorry.

cough _APPRECIATE MY PUN DAMNIT_ cough

That is a good point though.

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/WkW1JPA8XFo/maxresdefault.jpg
Obviously it's a new neo-season-6 skin. Executioner Amumu.
That actually sounds like a cool idea
